page.shortlink: api desktop api waitdialog class create function
page.description: The .CREATE() method creates and displays the {WAITDIALOG} dialog box with progress bar.
page.syntax: Create as P([message_lines as N [, style as C [, width as N ]]])

argument.name: message_lines
argument.description: The number of lines to allow below the progress bar for text messages, maximum of 3.

argument.name: style
argument.description: Wait dialog style to use. Can be one of the following:

item.name: Percent
item.description: A standard progress bar display that shows the degree of completion

item.name: Repeating
item.description: The progress bar builds from the left, disappears, and then builds again

item.name: Bounce
item.description: The progress bar shuttles left to right, then right to left, and repeats continuously

argument.name: width
argument.description: Defines the width of the the Xdialog waitdialog.

section.title: Example
section.example:
dim p3 as waitdialog p3.create(3,"bounce",500) 'set with width to 500 p3.set_color("dark green") p3.Set_Bottom_Message("This is the bottom row message - line1." + crlf() + "Line2") p3.Set_Message("This is the top row message.")
'to close the waitdialog p3.close()
